EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge 2015 - Up to 3,500 roles available this year!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact the Staffing Team on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
THE CHALLENGE 2015 - UP TO 3,500 ROLES AVAILABLE THIS YEAR!
Dear {!Contact.Name}
Applications open!
You told us you were interested in working on the NCS 2015 programmes. Applications for our seasonal roles are still open!
What is The Challenge?
We are the UK's largest provider of NCS - an exciting youth and community programme which combines outdoor activities, skill development and community volunteering.
In 2015, we aim to reach 25,000 young people who will be supported by 3,500 seasonal staff members. Want to be a part of this? Read on for more information.
What opportunities do you have available?
We have paid positions available for all entry levels, from those wishing to gain further experience working with young people, to experienced Project Managers, Teachers and Youth Workers.
I'm in! How do I apply?
You will need to complete an application form on our new Staffing Website. Our website allows you to manage and monitor your information easily.
https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2f
Login Details
As you previously registered your interest with us, you will already have a profile in our system; your login details are below.
Username: {!Contact.Email} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
Once you have logged in, simply change your password, update your profile and begin your application!
Any Questions?
If you have any questions please contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org quoting the email reference number below in any correspondence.
We look forward to receiving your application!
Best Wishes
The Challenge seasonalroles@the-challenge.org
Email Reference: CA 1.5
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
